pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Emmanuel Macron, President of France | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke today with President Emmanuel Macron of France.

The leaders reaffirmed their commitment to combating climate change, strengthening environmental protection, as well as pursuing clean energy and sustainable development.  

Prime Minister Trudeau and President Macron agreed to continue working closely with likeminded partners to implement the historic Paris Agreement on climate change.
